MAN.TITLE: %sn

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a point inside the fundamental rectangle defined by the elliptic integral; x is a vector of complex numbers

DESCRIPTION.P: Jacobi 's sn elliptic function with parameter m: the inverse of the elliptic integral for the parameter m.
The amplitude am is computed in fortran and the addition formulas for elliptic functions are applied

MAN.AUTHOR: F. D.
